amendatorysection.catchline: Teacher education program; include instruction in dyslexia.
amendatorysection.para: On and after July 1, 2019, each teacher education program approved by the State Board of Education shall include as a part of their initial program course requirements instruction in dyslexia, including, but not limited to:
(1) Knowledge and best practice standards for teaching reading;
(2) Characteristics of dyslexia and the science of dyslexia; and
(3) Evidence-based structured literacy interventions, classroom accommodations, and assistive technology for individuals with dyslexia.
